metadata.title: CVE-2024-47220

platform: SUSE Linux Enterprise High Performance Computing 15 SP5

SUSE Linux Enterprise Module for Basesystem 15 SP6
SUSE Linux Enterprise Server for SAP Applications 15 SP5

metadata.description: ** DISPUTED ** An issue was discovered in the WEBrick toolkit through 1.8.1 for Ruby. It allows HTTP request smuggling by providing both a Content-Length header and a Transfer-Encoding header, e.g., "GET /admin HTTP/1.1\r\n" inside of a "POST /user HTTP/1.1\r\n" request. NOTE: the supplier's position is "Webrick should not be used in production."
